entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.ClientModel #94126
  • [API Proposal]: Add additional parameter to PutAsJsonAsync to control whether to use chunked transfer encoding #94124
  • Support TimeSpan type in the RangeAttribute emitted code by options validation source generator #94119
    9.0.0
  • Exclude options properties of delegate types in configuration source generator #94117
    9.0.0
  • EventPipe Doesn't Work On OSX With Sandbox Enabled #94114
  • [API Proposal]: GCHandle.GetTargetUnsafe() with no handle validation #94113
    Future
  • [Wasm] Memory64 support #94108
  • NativeAOT compiler fails when it tries to emit a throw for BadImageFormatException #94107
  • [wasm] Windows: Failure to build browser, mono+libs with clean build of the runtime #94106
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code with the wrong nullable annotations #94105
  • [wasm] Some AOT configuration combinations to disallow #94103
    9.0.0
  • Potential perf improvement for Native AOT runtime tests #94102
    9.0.0
  • SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098
  • DispatchProxy invoke method returning GenericType with constraint TypeLoadException #94096
  • Bring Windows.Storage namespace into System.IO #94092
  • [API Proposal]: IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.Smoothstep #94091
  • ILVerify incorrectly complains about use of initonly field outside of constructor+ #94090
  • Marshal.GetHRForException isn't setting up IErrorInfo on NativeAOT #94088
  • Microsoft ODBC Driver for SQL Server fails with out any error message in the exception #94087
  • [Mono] System.Runtime.Tests fail with TypeLoadException #94086
    9.0.0
  • [Tracking] Implement Mono support for Swift calling convention #94081
    9.0.0
  • NativeLibrary.GetExport/TryGetExport on Linux don't offer the same semantics as dlsym() #94079
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Runtime tests' build gets terminated with `exited with code 137` #94077
    9.0.0
  • [GC] DATAS Startup time significantly worse than with workstation GC #94076
  • failure in CreateDefaultBuilder_ConfigJsonDoesReload #94075
    9.0.0

Closed

  • RequiresDynamicCodeAnalyzer misses MakeGenericType calls #93785
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Update WBT to use tfm=net9.0 #91357
    9.0.0
  • [WinHttpHandler] Assertion in AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #93099
    9.0.0
  • Allow XUnitLogChecker to Work Without Paths #93988
    9.0.0
  • GC.GetConfigurationVariables() not showing 'System.GC.LOHThreshold' #93963
  • Test failure: Wasm.Build.Tests.NativeBuildTests.MonoAOTCross_WorksWithNoTrimming #93522
  • [API Proposal]: Marshaller for OLE `VARIANT` #89543
    9.0.0
  • ILLink fails to resolve method's base interface method if the interface method doesn't have newslot #93008
  • Symbols archive for `runtime` repo should be moved to a smaller package #92775
  • [wasm][MT] crash in the browser-bench with MT enabled #94095
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App missing from dotnet distribution #94078
  • Could IServiceProvider support modularlized applications? #85907
    Future
  • When debugging in Roslyn-generated assembly in Visual Studio, it reports that the source file is different from the module was built. #94074
  • System.IO.Compression.SubReadStream Read Makes Unnecessary Calls #93478
  • [API Proposal]: Add protected factory method for creating Label in ILGenerator, abstract out LocalBuilder #93497
    9.0.0
  • Consider allowing user-defined PrintMembers via extension method for sealed types #93934
  • Please provide guidance on how to use DllImportResolver with dlopen on Linux (xref #11901) #93911
    9.0.0
  • superpmi-collect failing for smoke_tests with error MSB4184: The expression "[System.IO.Directory]::GetDirectories(/mnt/vss/_work/1/s/payload/workitem/collectAssembliesDirectory/smoke_tests)" cannot be evaluated #93845
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT Dumper? #93863
  • Running process on shared .NET 6 runtime encounters "could not load assembly" error after Windows Update #93995
  • Mono WASM PInvoke Table generation does not handle file scoped types #93999

PullRequests

Created

  • [workloads] Build the net8 workload msis #94125
    area-Build-mono
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Merge CodeGenBringUpTests projects #94122
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove the JIT/CheckProjects tool #94121
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude delegates from ConfigurationBinder source generator #94120
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Remove BundleLegacy test targeting netcoreapp3.0/3.1 #94118
    area-Single-File
  • Emit/Call member references in new ILGenerator #94116
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • enable two HTTP POST tests #94115
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • make Http2_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException test more deterministic #94112
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Fix dataflow tracking for nested finally regions #94101
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098 #94100
    needs-area-label
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid handing out duplicate `CORINFO_MODULE_STRUCT_*` handles #94082
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    area-System.Net.Security

Merged

  • Update trim/aot analyzer to run on generated code #94069
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add Separate Mode to XUnitLogChecker Where Only Dumps are Analyzed #94094
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #93984
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Added the LOHThreshold public key to the GC Config. #94068
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] make it easy to exclude browser-bench measurements #94099
    area-Diagnostics-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][wasm] WBT Stop taking latest sdk in release/8.0 #94097
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [wasm] Error out for AOT with no il trimming #94064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #93662
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Fold "X >= 0 && X < NN" to "X u< NN" #93834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interlocked intrinsic improvements #93821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix comment typo in object.h #94072
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Revert "[arm64] Addressing modes for SIMD (#67490)" #93981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement ThreeLetterISOLanguageName and ThreeLetterISOCountryName in hybrid mode #94010
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [SuperPMI] nativeaot collections build fix #94000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more data into MSTAT files #93842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a refleak in the IEnumerator marshalling tests. #94073
    test-bug, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fixup file type names. #94059
    blocking, area-Interop-mono

Updated

  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #93874
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: move return merging earlier #93997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][Wasm.Build.Tests] Use trimmer friendly JSON serialization #94034
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • [mono][wasm] Pass/receive SIMD arguments by value. #93794
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Trim analyzer: Implement intrinsics handling of object.GetType #93732
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Disabling tests failing in the last two weeks on MT. #94051
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 32 #94056
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser][CI] Add debug smoke test pipeline #94013
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    os-ios
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [RISC-V] Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Tests.ConversionTests #94042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support IValidatableObject for nested model types in options source gen #94062
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.1
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • exception when `dotnet new <template_shortName> -n <dirName>` #36508
  • APICompat falsely reports a compatibility problem when an API moves from virtual to override #36506

Closed

  • SDK ENOSPC: no space left on device, write #36323

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip a templating test when run internally #36499
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.3 to 22.1.4 in /eng/dependabot #36360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Upgrade Ubuntu image for Template Engine pipeline to 2204 #36503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #35173] WIP: `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2302394 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: spread elements are not expressions #7604

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullability analysis perf investigation during razor semantic classification #70609
    17.9
  • Migrate remaning integration tests to new framework #70608
    17.9
  • Call sites of a type marked with `[CreateNewOnMetadataUpdate]` don't use the updated type on metadata updates #70604
  • `CodeGenerationAttributeData` violates the expected nullability contract of its base type `AttributeData` #70592

Closed

  • Right-hand closing brackets (`>`) are not properly colored in nested generics #69811
    17.9
  • VBCSCompiler doesn't load changed dll referenced as analyzer reference #70053
    17.9
  • Boxing ValueTypes heavily when calling InheritanceMarginItem.Equals => InheritanceTargetItem.Equals #70559

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix regression in definite assignment analysis for out parameters in presence of local functions. #70607
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix caching of embedded classifications #70606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Perform decoding of AttributeUsageAttribute for PE types in PEModule. #70605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix flakey integration test #70603
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify classification caching checks #70601
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Keep unsplit states when analyzing sequence points and sequences #70596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow faster semantic classification for multiple text spans #70595
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Skip flaky test #70610
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix binary compat break with typescript #70611
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Watch project.assets.json files for nuget restore #70602
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of CWT in syntactic classifier #70584
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable flaky test #70589
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • PR feedback and further cleanup/sharing in extract method code. #70481
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run analyzer consistency checks on .NET Core #70517
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix a couple of bugs found in "use collection expression" #70539
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make struct type into a record. #70581
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump Razor to 7.0.0-preview.23525.7 #70568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove syntax serialization logic. #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add restore support to the language server #70588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' does not nullify globalconfig severity setting #70572
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not allocate unused fields for primary constructor parameters in a state machine type. #70587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to a different Editor API to fix test flakiness #70578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] IDisposable Sanity check on Blazor Component #51714
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51712
  • Perf improvement: mvc #51711
  • Re-enable source index #51709
  • [Blazor] Prevent unwanted DOM merging during enhanced page updates #51707
  • Enhanced Navigation doesn't work inside SVG element #51705
  • Blazor Server with OpenIdConnect authentication fails when trying to sign out #51702
  • get InvalidCastException when I use [Inject]IAccessTokenProvider #51699
  • MapBlazorHub configuration in NET8 throws a `The request matched multiple endpoints` exception #51698
  • In .NET 8 Blazor Web App, FontAwsome icons not displayed when navigating to a page #51696
  • When will Blazor have a better debugging method in vscode? #51693
  • Blazor Enhanced Load navigation doesn't replace template elements #51692

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #51625
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mapaction #51633
  • Perf regression: single_query #51694
  • Using a Layout defined in BlazorApp.Client project results in a exception during SSR #51648
  • app.UsePathBase(pathBase) add support to read pathbase from request header to handle multitenant application #51669
  • New MVC project results in InvalidOperationException: The view 'Index' was not found. #51697
  • AddRoles to a Blazor 8 app throws System.AggregateException #51638
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51595
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #51614
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, single_query #51627
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes, updates #51628
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #51629
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #51630
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plaintext #51631
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext, plaintext #51632
  • Kestrel Picks the Wrong SSL Certificate #51688

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SourceIndexPackageVersion #51715
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestUtils #51713
    area-infrastructure
  • Disable source index build step #51710
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Enhanced Navigation for <svg> element #51706
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `116b7e5` to `5b7fd63` #51700
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/setup-node from 3 to 4 #51703
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Add required first level titles in doc files #51708
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Documenting the new help-wanted process #51664
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Optimize CancellationToken handling #51660
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linux arm32 lldb dump debugging commands not working #4370
  • Seg Fault with dotnet-dump on specific arm32 Linux device #4369
  • dumpstackobjects causes TargetInvocationException #4368
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • format timestamps so they are universally readable #4371

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add partial SOS 'clrstack' command implementation. #4356

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Shell theme incorrect when pushing a modal page at startup #18409
  • What is the MAUI future ? #18408
  • Size WebView to content #18404
  • Unloded and Loaded events invoke multiple times at start #18403
  • [WinUI] TemplatedItemsList and underlying ListView UI elements are disconnected, creates phantom views. #18401
  • Auto Dial Functionality in PhoneDialer(maui.essentials) #18400
  • iOS Keyboard Issue: 'Next' Button Missing on Entry #18399
  • [WinUI] ListView 'HasUnevenRows'=False does nothing #18397
  • Can't install MAUI workload for iOS and MacOs on Windows #18396
  • CollectionView Layout breaks if IsVisible starts as False #18395
    Backlog
  • MapWKUIDelegate conditional compilation for MacCatalyst #18394
    Backlog
  • Text Color for Button, Picker, CheckBox cannot be changed on Windows, iOS, MacCatalyst #18393

Closed

  • Maui 8 preview 6 Visual studio 2022 preview 4 - Cannot build android or iOS blank app (windows host) #16259
  • How to interact with non lifecycle events in MainActivity #16524
  • MAUI Slider height property is not setting the height of it #17622
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9373] MultiBinding Throwing Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #18123
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Add Test for RefreshView / Scrolling #11637
    Backlog
  • How can I get a reference to the image controls in the CarouselView in the cs file? #18391
  • Default MAUI Blazor app always has title 'BlazorWeb-CSharp' and doesn't open default file #18382
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.3] Bump macios to latest #18406
  • Ignore visual tests on iPhone 15 devices #18407
  • [C] clear _targetObject #18398
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Fix Device Info Test API 33 #18390
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix project name substitution in Blazor template nav menu and "VS install" prompt #18388
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Merge net8.0 into main #18380
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add device test for PR #18356 #18387
  • [net8.0] Update stable branding #18384
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm and bring iOS17 tests #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 7 Temporal table save The expected type was 'System.DateTime' but the actual value was of type 'System.Int32'. #32174
  • Empty array returned when executing stored procedure against MSSQL server #32173
  • .NET Maui, Inserting Entitys in SQL Database, PK Field int, Starting from int value 0 causes crash #32172
  • Microsoft.Extensions dependencies in 8.0 latest nightly broken #32171

Closed

  • IMaterializationInterceptor causes InMemory database to lose entities #32170
  • Migrations bundle requires an appsettings file if a named connection string is used #32009
  • Is there any workaround for issue #26703 #32046
  • Best way to configure default schema retroactively (SQL Server) #32047
  • Why a left join when the right part is the result? #31350

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Install of 8.0.100-rtm.23526.1 failed due to "insufficient privileges" #17645

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the manifests for .net8 #17647
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17646
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17642

Merged

  • Revert "Bump `darc` to fix package version updates" #17644
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17631
  • Add scenario tests project #17636
  • Bump `darc` to fix package version updates #17639
  • Update the stage 0 version and unwind a few of the upgrade changes #17617
  • Update source build pipeline triggers #17547
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Ignore CFS0013 errors for non-Azure Artifact feeds #17637
  • Update VMR's README instructions to `9.0.100` #17638

Updated

  • Add coherent dependency for emsdk on runtime and run an coherency update #17600
  • Enable coherency dependency flow for emsdk #17601
  • Split current CI pipline #17370
    Area-SourceBuild
